overview: We are proud to introduce the newest girl to our I Love series! Yes, that's right. It's our very own contract girl, Ashlynn Brooke, and now is your chance to own 8 of her finest scenes to date. You know you can't resist that cute little smile, those soft, luscious breasts, and that tight, little ass. She's the perfect example of the perfect girl, and now she can be yours in this special collector's edition that features over 3 hours and 30 minutes of nonstop, in your face sex. So we guess the real question is...Why would you love Ashlynn Brooke?
title: I Love Ashlynn 1
